text: WFLO is a Country formatted broadcast radio station licensed to Farmville, Virginia, serving Farmville and Prince Edward County, Virginia. WFLO is owned and operated by Colonial Broadcasting Company, Inc. ==References== ==External links== * WFLO-AM Online Category:1947 establishments in Virginia Category:Country radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 1947 FLO FLO
title: WFLO (AM)
